short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that makes ocw.cs.pub.ro full width!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that makes ocw.cs.pub.ro full width!
It inserts 2 lines of css at page load, for every page on the website.
This way we can benefit the full width of our screens when browsing through OCW.
